text:
Prisoners (Interstate Transfer) Amendment Order 2003

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, make the following order-in-council under section 4(1) of the Prisoners (Interstate Transfer) Act 1982 .

15 December 2003

RICHARD BUTLER

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

JUDY JACKSON

Minister for Justice and Industrial Relations

1. Short title
    This order-in-council may be cited as the Prisoners (Interstate Transfer) Amendment Order 2003 .

2. Commencement
    This order-in-council takes effect on the day on which its making is notified in the Gazette.

3. Principal Order
    In this order-in-council, the Prisoners (Interstate Transfer) Order 1984 is referred to as the Principal Order.

4. Schedule 1 amended (Interstate Laws)
    Schedule 1 to the Principal Order is amended by inserting after
    Prisoners (Interstate Transfer) Act 1983  Northern Territory
                                                                
    
    the following item:
    Prisoners (Interstate Transfer) Act 1993  Australian Capital Territory
                                                                          
    

    Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

    Notified in the Gazette on 24 December 2003

    This order-in-council is administered in the Department of Justice and Industrial Relations.
